item.title: From land owners to landless, generations of cotton seed farmers exploited in Telangana
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Debt has been used as an age-old modus operandi by the wealthy and powerful to take away the lands from the farmers. The money lenders use several ways to push the farmers into a debt spiral. With the interest on the debt, which compounded their problems to a stage of becoming bad debt, the farmers ultimately get dispossessed of their lands.
The case of the cotton seed farmers in Jogulamba Gadwal district is just one of the vicious ways in which seed organisers (middlemen), mostly ha...]]>
item.author: Vivek Bhoomi

item.title: Mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi orders sanitation drive in Jubilee Hills slums
item.description:
<![CDATA[Hyderabad: Mayor Gadwal Vijayalakshmi on Monday, August 11, instructed Greater Hyderabad Municipal Corporation (GHMC) officers to step up sanitation drives in the slums of the city, hinting at stern action against complacency in the midst of the ongoing monsoon season.
Along with Zonal Commissioner Anurag Jayanthi, the Mayor visited Ambedkar Nagar and Uday Nagar bastis under Jubilee Hills Circle. She directed officials to concentrate on garbage removal, ensure the removal of building debris, an...]]>
item.author: News Desk
